title: Sell ADA Tickets
description: A guest calls the box office to purchase tickets in a wheelchair accessible section.

tasks.description: Identify the event the guest is interested in.
Check the availability of wheelchair accessible seating for that event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds several available wheelchair spaces.

tasks.description: Ask the guest if they also need a companion seat.
tasks.expected_outcome: The guest requests one companion seat.

tasks.description: Sell the guest one wheelchair space and one companion seat, and process the payment.
